statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -3 \\ -2 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 3 \\ -2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 8 \\ -18 \\ 8 \\ -14 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -10 \\ 24 \\ -12 \\ 20 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 18 \\ -16 \\ 22 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ -4 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
